query:
SELECT 
  p.id, p.term, p.createdAt, p.updatedAt,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM padronizacao_reads pr WHERE pr.padronizacaoId = p.id) as read_count
FROM padronizacao p
WHERE p.updatedAt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
ORDER BY p.updatedAt DESC
LIMIT 5;

  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM padronizacao_reads pr WHERE pr.padronizacaoId = p.id) as read_count
FROM padronizacao p
WHERE p.updatedAt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
ORDER BY p.updatedAt DESC
LIMIT 5;
